text.text: Oh hello cutie I'll be your instructor
Your first lesson will be on how to gather resources
First select some gatherer units using left click
Now that they are selected rifht click on a resource
And they should get there and start working for you!
Now let's recruit some new units
First off select your Town Hall
Click on the button that has a gatherer in it
Notice that you need some resources to recruit it
Above the recruit button there's a level up button
This will increse the units stats!
